# Implementation notes

# Univariate Guassian

## Model
Greek letter known *a priori*.
Cost is twice negative log-likelihood

\[
\mathcal{C}\left(y_t\right) = 
\frac{\left(y_t - \mu_t - m_k\right)^{2}}{s_{k}\sigma_{k}} + \log\left(2\pi\right) = \log\left(s_{k}\sigma_{k}\right)
\]
